Automate! - Gail Ollis  - ACCU 2025 Short Talks
---

Discover how to boost developer productivity by automating software tasks—not just in production code, but in your day-to-day workflows. In this lightning talk, you'll learn why some of the best developers use automation to improve collaboration, reduce technical debt, and document processes more effectively.

This talk challenges the traditional boundaries of “productive” coding, highlighting that internal tooling and workflow automation are equally vital. Drawing from PhD research and real-world developer interviews, the speaker explores what makes someone a great colleague in software engineering. One standout insight? Automating tasks is one of the most appreciated contributions you can make to a team.
